TitleEnglish: The Legend of Sword and Fairy 3
SummaryEnglish: The work is adapted from the classic game of the same name. A thousand years ago, the divine general Feipeng and the demon lord Chonglou engaged in a fierce battle in the New Celestial Realm. The divine sword "Zhaodan" fell to the human world, and Feipeng was banished to the mortal realm. A thousand years later, the Demon-Suppressing Tower of Shushan trembles, and the reincarnation of Feipeng—Jing Tian—who now possesses the demon sword, embarks on an adventure with Tang Xuejian, Xu Changqing, and Zixuan to collect the Five Spirit Beads and seal the tower.
